| Overview             = The '''Monster Hunters''' are an informal band of adventures founded by immortal warrior; [[Ulysses Bloodstone (Earth-616)|Ulysses Bloodstone]]. He was joined by the mystical [[Anthony Druid (Earth-616)|Doctor Druid]], the super fast [[Makkari (Earth-616)|Hurricane]], the Wakandan warrior; [[Zawadi (Wakandan) (Earth-616)|Zawadi]]{{r|Marvel Universe #4}} and later [[Aquaria Neptuna (Earth-616)|Namora]] herself.{{r|Marvel: The Lost Generation #2}} He hoped to use the team in the never ending battle of the monsters plaguing the planet [[Earth]].{{r|Marvel Universe #4}}

| HistoryText             = In 1956, the Bloodstone travelled to [[Africa]] due to a request by a friend [[Lynn Avery (Earth-616)|Lynn Avery]]. He arrived to stop [[Grottu (Earth-616)|Grottu]] a mutated giant ant. The creature controlled an army of ant that headed straight for the city of Mombasa. However the passed through revealing their true plan to escape on a ship to conquer the world. He shot at Grottu's antennae limiting his control of the army. He found a warehouse full of sugar and then dumped it on Grottu. His army attacked him eating the sugar and they appeared to have killed the creature.{{r|Strange Tales #73}} He followed back through the creature destructive path to the land of [[Wakanda]]. There he was a attack by a ''[[Tyrannosaurus rex]]'' but was saved by a Wakandan warrior named [[Zawadi (Wakandan) (Earth-616)|Zwadi]]. He was not able to find the true origin of the creature but believed that it hailed from a [[Subterranea|land deep underground]]. She accompanied him back home to New York and at the [[Explorer's Club]] they formed a team with [[Makkari (Earth-616)|Makkari]] and [[Anthony Druid (Earth-616)|Doctor Druid]] they formed the Monster Hunters.{{r|Marvel Universe #4}}

One of their first adventures as a team was to take down [[Gorgilla (Earth-616)|Gorgilla]] who was sent to [[New York City]] by the [[Deviants (Homo descendus)|Deviant]] [[Kro (Earth-616)|Kro]]. They tracked the creature throughout the city and tried to capture him at [[Yankee Stadium]]. They failed and the trial lead them to the [[Statue of Liberty]] and Doctor Druid used his powers to calm the best so they could return it to the wild.{{r|Marvel Universe #5}} They traveled to [[Midnight Mountain]] to return the creature but they was attacked by the [[Lizard Men (Deviants)|Lizard Men]]. But with the help of Gorgilla they were able to fight them off.{{r|Marvel Universe #6}} Makkari was kidnapped in the fight and falling the trail they encounter [[Gigantus (Earth-616)|Gigantus]]. They was able to fight him off destroying their ship in the process. They traveled deep beneath the Earth to find the layer of Kro. They freed their friend but Kro escaped when they was set upon by [[Deviant Mutates (Deviant Experiments)|Kro's mutates]] allowing him time to escape.{{r|Marvel Universe #7}} 

In 1958, Bloodstone and the Monster Hunters traveled to a Long Island research center, where they meet the newly formed team called the [[First Line (Earth-616)|First Line]].They was then attacked by a series of mutated humans who had been turned into monster by a Skrull device.{{r|Marvel: The Lost Generation #2}}
